text: He imanadaraganana [1]! Tomadera kache mumina narira hijarata kare asale tomara taderake pariksa karo [2]; allaha tadera imana sambandhe samyaka abagata. Atahpara yadi tomara janate para ye, tara mumina nari, tabe taderake kaphiradera kache pherata pathiye diyo na. Mumina narigana kaphiradera jan'ya baidha naya ebam kaphiragana mumina naridera jan'ya baidha naya. Kaphirara ya byaya kareche ta taderake phiriye di'o. Tarapara tomara taderake biye karale tomadera kono aparadha habe na yadi tomara taderake tadera mahara da'o. Ara tomara kaphira naridera sathe dampatya samparka bajaya rekho na [3]. Tomara ya byaya karecha ta pherata ca'ibe ebam kaphirara ya byaya kareche ta yena tara ceye neya. Eta'i allahara bidhana; tini tomadera madhye phayasala kare thakena.
